section.title: Environment configuration
section.para: The working version of the application is available on-line at http://livedemo.exadel.com/realworld/.
In order to download the application sources and deploy them locally the following should be installed and configured on your computer:

section.title: Installation
section.para: Follow the next steps for downloading and installing the Real World demo.

listitem.para: </>Checkout the project using installed SVN client. URL of repository: https://svn.jboss.org/repos/richfaces/trunk/test-applications/realworld/;
Build the project. Open command line console, point to the folder with checkouted project and tell Maven: mvn clean install eclipse:eclipse;

Import the project into your IDE. Steps to follow for JBDS users: click File -> Import and select Existing project into Workspace as import source; in Import Project window click Browse button and point to the realworld project folder; —Ålick OK. Three SNAPSHOTS (ear, ejb, web) should appear in Projects area. Checkmark them all and click Finish. These projects appear in JBDS Package Explorer window.

Register the pass to project images. Open project web.xml file (realworld-web-1.0-SNAPSHOT/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/web.xml) and change uploadRoot parameter value from E:/Andrey/Upload/ to yours e.g. D:/realworld/Upload/.
Run realworld-ear-1.0-SNAPSHOT on the JBoss 4.2. Server under 3 Runtime (those who prefer manual job should deploy and start realworld.ear file).
